title: 2 Story House on 34 perch Land (Total land extend 50 perches)
details:
Architect designed beautiful 2 story house. Total land extend 50 perches. Could have the choice of purchasing the house with 34 perches which is Rs. 63 mil.. Whole property 85 mil..

4 Bedrooms and 3 bathrooms. Air-conditioned rooms and 2 bathrooms are attached, Living, Veranda, Dinning, TV lounge, balconies, roof top terrace, Indoor garden, Pantry with a servant’s room, toilet and a garage.

Hot water, SLT line, Internt & Cable tv. 2 bedrooms has fitted wall cupboards.

Built for personal use and timber used for stairway-kumbuk, doors & windows-jack, pantry-teek, roof and pillars-balaw, fitted wall cupboards in rooms & bathrooms-mahogany.

Exclusive quiet residential area. Ample natural light and ventilation into the house. Beautifully landscaped garden with a parapet wall. Built on a higher elevation. Ample parking.



20 feet concrete road. 1 km to the main road (Kalalgoda junction) and 2.5 km to Thalawathugoda Junction. Very close to Austasia Club, mega Keels, Food city, Banks, Restaurants and Shopping malls etc.
